doc_string.value:
@notice Claim all available rewards
    @dev Only callable by the reward receiver

@notice Initiate ownership tansfer of the contract
    @param _owner Address to have ownership transferred to

natspec.author: Curve.Fi

commit_transfer_ownership(address).notice: Initiate ownership tansfer of the contract

params._owner: Address to have ownership transferred to

get_reward().details: Only callable by the reward receiver

set_reward_data(uint256,address,address).notice: Set data about a reward streamer

params._claim: Address of the streamer to claim from

natspec.notice: Passthrough to allow claiming from multiple reward streamers
